original_text: Lord my God, I am only a young man. I have not learned how to rule well. But you have now made me become king, as my father David was king.
korean_text: 나의 하나님 여호와여 주께서 종으로 종의 아버지 다윗을 대신하여 왕이 되게 하셨사오나 종은 작은 아이라 출입할 줄을 알지 못하고

sentences.original_text: I am only a young man
I have not learned how to rule well
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 잘 다스리는 법을 배우지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: But you have now made me become king
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 이제 나를 왕이 되게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: as my father David was king
